#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int n;
int merger(int *arr,int left,int mid,int right)
{
    int sol[n],ct=0;
    int i=left,j=mid+1,itr=left;
    while(i<=mid&&j<=right)
    {
        if(*(arr+i)<*(arr+j))
        {

            *(sol+itr) = *(arr+i);
            i++;
            itr++;
        }
        else
        {
            ct+=(mid-i+1);
            *(sol+itr) = *(arr+j);
            j++;
            itr++;
        }
    }
    if(i>mid)
    {
        while(j<=right)
        {
            *(sol+itr)=*(arr+j);
            j++;
            itr++;
        }
    }
    else
    {
        while(i<=mid)
        {
            *(sol+itr)=*(arr+i);
            i++;
            itr++;
        }
    }
    i=left;
    while(i<=right)
    {
        *(arr+i)=*(sol+i);
        i++;
    }
    return ct;
}
int mergesort(int *arr,int left,int right)
{
    int ans=0;
    if(left<right)
    {
        int mid=(left+right)/2;
        ans+=mergesort(arr,left,mid);
        ans+=mergesort(arr,mid+1,right);
        ans+=merger(arr,left,mid,right);
    }
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    //printf("Enter the number of elements :\t");
    scanf("%d",&n);
    //cout<<endl;
    int arr[n];
    int i=0;
    //printf("Enter the elements in the array : \n");
    while(i<n)
    {
        scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        i++;
    }
    //cout<<endl;
    cout<<mergesort(arr,0,n-1)<<endl;
    /*i=0;
    printf("The sorted array is :\n");
    while(i<n)
    {
        printf("%d ",arr[i]);
        i++;
    }
    cout<<endl;*/
    return 0;
}
